nodes.text: The Kalranoos carbine was a sonic carbine weapon developed by weapons engineer Bobor Kalranoos. It was a hybrid design that stemmed from the modifications of a Geonosian carbine.
One particular Kalranoos carbine was found in Sordaan Xris's collection of exotic weapons. Sordaan claimed to have acquired the weapon in a wager with a Leresai bounty hunter.

The Kalranoos carbine appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
